name: Cymodocea nodosa in the slovenian coastal area
description: Cymodocea nodosa sampling in the Slovenian coast in 2009-2010. This dataset containslength of the photosynthetic part of the leaf and abundanceof Cymodocea nodosa. 10 samples were collected at each of the 10 locations. In each sample, the length of the photosynthetic partwas measured for 60 adult/intermediate leaves for a correct assessment of the Mediterranean meadows which is of greatimportance for the implementation of the Water Framework Directive (WFD),the Marine Strategy Framework Directive (MSFD), and theHabitat Directive (HD)
